etymology.description: Pictogram: a stone beneath a cliff (厂); the cliff later became 丆. Sometimes interpreted as a cave set into a cliff.
etymology.interpretation: Depicts a rock under an overhanging cliff, directly conveying the idea of stone. Over time the cliff component 厂 was stylized into 丆; some traditions read the scene as a cave in a cliff, still pointing to rock and earth.

examples.chinese: 他捡起一块石头(他撿起一塊石頭)。
这些矿石含有丰富的铁(這些礦石含有豐富的鐵)。
examples.pinyin: Zhèxiē kuàngshí hányǒu fēngfù de tiě.
